languages.text: "Также я должна вас поблагодарить за то, что вы наконец-то {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}заткнули отче Иеронимуса{/d}! Если душу и правда очищают мучения, то после недель его визгливых разглагольствований, я, должно быть, сама уже святой стала".

traits.locale_text: "Также я должна вас поблагодарить за то, что вы наконец-то заткнули того проповедничка! Если душу и правда очищают мучения, то после недель его визгливых разглагольствований, я, должно быть, сама уже святой стала".

languages.text: "I should also thank you for finally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}shutting up Reverend Hieronymus{/d}! If trials really do cleanse the soul, then after weeks of listening to his shrill hectoring, I must have the soul of a saint."
languages.original_text: "Также я должна вас поблагодарить за то, что вы наконец-то {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}заткнули отче Иеронимуса{/d}! Если душу и правда очищают мучения, то после недель его визгливых разглагольствований, я, должно быть, сама уже святой стала".

traits.locale_text: "I should also thank you for finally shutting up Reverend Hieronymus! If trials really do cleanse the soul, then after weeks of listening to his shrill hectoring, I must have the soul of a saint."
"I should also thank you for finally shutting up Reverend Hieronymus! If trials really do cleanse the soul, then after weeks of listening to his shrill hectoring, I must have the soul of a saint."
"I should also thank you for finally shutting up Reverend Hieronymus! If trials really do cleanse the soul, then after weeks of listening to his shrill hectoring, I must have the soul of a saint."
"I should also thank you for finally shutting up Reverend Hieronymus! If trials really do cleanse the soul, then after weeks of listening to his shrill hectoring, I must have the soul of a saint."

languages.text: “我也得感谢你，希罗尼穆斯牧师终于{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}彻底闭嘴{/d}了！如果审判真的可以净化灵魂，那我听了他自吹自擂了这么长时间，我的灵魂肯定已经像圣人一样了。”
languages.original_text: "I should also thank you for finally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}shutting up Reverend Hieronymus{/d}! If trials really do cleanse the soul, then after weeks of listening to his shrill hectoring, I must have the soul of a saint."

traits.locale_text: “我也得感谢你，希罗尼穆斯牧师终于彻底闭嘴了！如果审判真的可以净化灵魂，那我听了他自吹自擂了这么长时间，我的灵魂肯定已经像圣人一样了。”

languages.text: «¡También debería agradecerle que haya {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}callado al reverendo Hieronymus{/d}! Si de verdad es cierto lo de que el sufrimiento purifica el alma, entonces después de aguantar sus arengas durante semanas debo ir camino de ser santa».
languages.original_text: "I should also thank you for finally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}shutting up Reverend Hieronymus{/d}! If trials really do cleanse the soul, then after weeks of listening to his shrill hectoring, I must have the soul of a saint."

traits.locale_text: «¡También debería agradecerle que haya callado al reverendo Hieronymus! Si de verdad es cierto lo de que el sufrimiento purifica el alma, entonces después de aguantar sus arengas durante semanas debo ir camino de ser santa».

languages.text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}ヒエロニムス司祭を黙らせてくれた{/d}ことも感謝しないとね！試練が本当に魂を浄化するのであれば、何週間もあいつのお説教を聞いてたから、今頃は聖人の魂を持ってるっての」
languages.original_text: "I should also thank you for finally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}shutting up Reverend Hieronymus{/d}! If trials really do cleanse the soul, then after weeks of listening to his shrill hectoring, I must have the soul of a saint."

traits.locale_text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}ヒエロニムス司祭を黙らせてくれた{/d}ことも感謝しないとね！試練が本当に魂を浄化するのであれば、何週間もあいつのお説教を聞いてたから、今頃は聖人の魂を持ってるっての」

languages.text: "Außerdem muss ich Euch dafür danken, dass Ihr {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}Reverend Hieronymus endlich mundtot gemacht habt{/d}! Falls Prüfungen wirklich die Seele reinigen, dann muss ich nach seinen wochenlangen schrillen Einschüchterungen die Seele einer Heiligen haben."
languages.original_text: "I should also thank you for finally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}shutting up Reverend Hieronymus{/d}! If trials really do cleanse the soul, then after weeks of listening to his shrill hectoring, I must have the soul of a saint."

traits.locale_text: "Außerdem muss ich Euch dafür danken, dass Ihr Reverend Hieronymus endlich mundtot gemacht habt! Falls Prüfungen wirklich die Seele reinigen, dann muss ich nach seinen wochenlangen schrillen Einschüchterungen die Seele einer Heiligen haben."

languages.text: « Je dois aussi vous remercier d'avoir enfin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}fait taire le révérend Hiéronymus{/d} ! Si vraiment les épreuves purifient l'âme, après toutes ces semaines passées à écouter ses sermons stridents, je dois pas être loin d'être une sainte. »
languages.original_text: "I should also thank you for finally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}shutting up Reverend Hieronymus{/d}! If trials really do cleanse the soul, then after weeks of listening to his shrill hectoring, I must have the soul of a saint."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois aussi vous remercier d'avoir enfin fait taire le révérend Hiéronymus ! Si vraiment les épreuves purifient l'âme, après toutes ces semaines passées à écouter ses sermons stridents, je dois pas être loin d'être une sainte. »

languages.text: "Ayrıca nihayet {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}Muhterem Hieronymus'u susturmayı başardığın{/d} için de teşekkür etmesem olmaz! İnsan ruhu sınanarak gerçekten arınıyormuş ya, haftalarca onun tiz sesiyle kabadayılık etmesini dinledikten sonra benden azize olur."
languages.original_text: "I should also thank you for finally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusDead}shutting up Reverend Hieronymus{/d}! If trials really do cleanse the soul, then after weeks of listening to his shrill hectoring, I must have the soul of a saint."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıca nihayet Muhterem Hieronymus'u susturmayı başardığın için de teşekkür etmesem olmaz! Eğer insan ruhu gerçekten sınanarak arınıyorsa, o hâlde haftalarca onun tiz sesiyle kabadayılık etmesini dinledikten sonra benden azize olur."
